condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 3.3: Les stratégies nationales pour l’EHA dans les ecoles sont renforcées et plus de 1000 écoles parmi les plus démunies atteignent les standards EHA préconisés (au niveau des équipements, de la promotion de l'hygiène et de la gouvernance locale) permettant à plus de 290,000 enfants d'étudier dans un meilleur environnement scolaire.
Number of schools which have attained the WASH standards through interventions coordinated by UNICEF
Number of studies and/or research implemented to monitor and document the adoption of good hygiene practices

actual.value: 2014:5 ((Baseline study, Dehydration and cognitive relation study and hand-washing latrine use study, menstrual hygiene management study, WinS impact study)

title.narrative: Number of children benefitting from a healthy school environment through WASH interventions coordinated by UNICEF
